title: Night shift work linked to an increased risk of obesity

title_detail.value: Night shift work linked to an increased risk of obesity

summary: In an analysis of 28 published studies, night shift work was associated with a 29 percent increased risk of becoming obese or overweight.

summary_detail.value: In an analysis of 28 published studies, night shift work was associated with a 29 percent increased risk of becoming obese or overweight.
